name: Dubstep Pong!
description:
Dubstep Pong!

HI!

My name is Facundo Ponce, and i made this prototype/game inspired on the classic Pong game.

The game has the basics mechanics of a pong game, where you control a player, that is a rectangle, and you need protect your side from the incoming ball and try score the opposite side.

The game also has some dubstep music that makes the game more funny and epic at the gameplay.

FEATURES

  • The game has multiple settings that you can change, (kinda weird cuz the menu it is not the best)  like controls of the player, the volume of the music, or color of the rectangles.
  • The game has two game modes, 1v1 and PJvsIA where you can play with a friend at the same PC or play with the computer with three different difficulties
  • The gameplay is more funny because it have some power ups that make the matches more flexible.

CREDITS

Music 

Songs with artists:

  • Kroww - Hysteria
  • Syn - Steel
  • Evilwave & Antima - Tinnitus
  • Doom eternal OST - The only thing they fear is you

Developed by Facundo Ponce  |     Mail  dev.facundo.ponce@gmail.com

Made it with raylib by Raysan5 https://github.com/raysan5/raylib

I get the background from https://www.marcelopedra.com.ar/blog/2013/10/14/50-gif-animados-de-fondos-de-vid... 

Thanks for the time an i hope you enjoy the game with your friends!
